## **Data extraction** with structured outputs

### Install `strip-tags`

``` bash
uv tool install strip-tags
```

### Extract JSON with `--schema-multi`

``` bash
curl -o- https://github.com/chriscarrollsmith?tab=followers | \
    strip-tags --minify | \
    llm "Extract followers" --schema-multi "id str: user screen name, content str: user bio (default 'Github user')" | \
    jq '[.items[]]' > followers.json
```
